name: Albert之小站
body:
***
# Welcome!
Oh, you're looking at my site! My name is Albert Wang. I am a Machine Learner and Software Engineer. I love to make awesome stuff. I am currently deep diving into deep learning.

你在看我的网站耶！我叫哲的王，擅长哲の学。同时擅长机器学习、Python 和 JavaScript。

# Deep Learning 深度学习
I trained a Deep Convolutional Neural Network to recognize digits.
[Take a look](https://github.com/CreatCodeBuild/deep-learning-capstone)

# 3D & VR
Explore algorithms in a 3D world.
[Take a look](https://creatcodebuild.github.io/3d.html)

# Tutorials 教程
闲暇时间，我会录制视频教程，与大家分享我的学习。

In my spare time, I make video tutorials to share my learning with people.

## TensorFlow Tutorial in Chinese 中文TensorFlow教程
[TF Girls 修炼指南 1：Intro](http://www.bilibili.com/video/av6495580)

[TF Girls 修炼指南 2：Placeholder](http://www.bilibili.com/video/av6496776)

[TF Girls 修炼指南 3：作用域的一些问题](http://www.bilibili.com/video/av6497643)

[TF Girls 修炼指南 4：开始机器学习吧！](http://www.bilibili.com/video/av6510898)

[TF Girls 修炼指南 5：数据的预处理](http://www.bilibili.com/video/av6531490)

[TF Girls 修炼指南 6：查看数据的统计分布](http://www.bilibili.com/video/av6544856)

[TF Girls 修炼指南 7：解密神经网络 —— 数据流图谱之谜](http://www.bilibili.com/video/av6563470/)

## Have Fun with JavaScript 来玩JavaScript吧
[《算 Craft 》第一期：雏形](http://www.bilibili.com/video/av6468122/)

wangxuanzhealbert@gmail.com
